content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Easy to understand and can be done in less than five minutes.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Simple and clear to understand, the description is not long, interesting ways to solve.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Easy to understand, clear with the instructions, Tests help if a case is forgotten, not that long to develop
Good improvement, one small edit, the first testcase is called 'Exemple', I assume it should be 'Example'

1. "." should be replaced with a more proper variable name in the Goal section.
2. Please write "integer" instead of "int" in Input section.
3. Please adhere to the contribution guidelines and avoid binary output (i.e. there should be more than 2 possible answers instead of just "Yes"/"No").
https://www.codingame.com/playgrounds/40701/help-center/contribution-guidelines
I'll change the rules to have to calculate the lack of kibble, thanks for your help ! For the other changes, it's done thanks.
Thanks for your help. I've modified this !
